verses.text:
Praise ye Je-ho-vah's name, Praise through His courts His fame;
Strike up, and praise His name, From all be-low.

Praise pre-cious, Him and glo-ry, Sing of His tri-umph sto-ry,
Ex-alt His sac-red name, From all be-low.

Heav'n's ar-chway, Sound His great song of love,
Shine forth, ye stars a-bove, From all be-low.

While life shall praise we pour, Visit us His mer-cy,
End - less shall be our pow'r, From all be-low.
